argument.description: An expression that returns a value of one of the following built-in data types: a DATE or a TIMESTAMP.
An expression that returns a value of one of the following built-in data types: a DATE or a TIMESTAMP.
An expression that returns a built-in character data type.

description: The NEXT_DAY scalar function returns a datetime value that represents the first weekday, named by string-expression, that is later than the date in expression.
